name: Summer Asian Salad with Honey Chicken, Mango, and Broccolini
author: @lex
summary: A great Asian salad that is perfect for summer. With mango, avocado, and honey-infused chicken, this recipe is great for entertaining, is healthy, and tastes fresh.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed
3 tablespoons Indonesian sweet soy sauce (kecap manis)
1 bunch broccolini, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces
3 ounces snow peas, ends and strings removed
1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and sliced
1 large Hass avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat until shimmering, about 1 minute
Cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 3 to 5 minutes
Place lemon juice, soy sauce, and 2 tablespoons honey in a small bowl; whisk dressing until well combined
Rinse bok choy, broccolini, and snow peas together in a strainer
Transfer to a microwave-safe bowl; cook in the microwave until lightly steamed, about 3 minutes
Transfer to a large salad bowl; add tomatoes, mango, avocado, bell pepper, and chicken
Pour in dressing and toss well to coat
